🤖 **Planner Analysis & Task Pipeline**

2. **news_fetcher**

3. **arxiv_summarizer**

**🎯 Expected Output:** Comprehensive research summary with sources

execution_results.output:
## Nikola Topić

Nikola Topić is a Serbian professional basketball player for the Oklahoma City Thunder of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Standing at 6 ft 6 in (1.98 m), he plays at the point guard position.

**Source:** [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nikola_Topi%C4%87](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nikola_Topi%C4%87)
